name: taaspace
description: A ZUI positioning lib for squareformatted images.

scripts.build: npm run test:lint && npm run build:min && npm run test:headless
scripts.build:dev: npm run test:lint && npm run build:debug && npm run test:headless
scripts.build:min: browserify --debug --standalone taaspace src/index.js -p [minifyify --map taaspace.min.js.map --output taaspace.min.js.map] > taaspace.min.js
scripts.test: npm run test:lint && npm run test:headless
scripts.#: --ignore-resource-errors will prevent PhantomJS logging error messages about missing files, as we test initializing Taas with missing image files.
scripts.build:examples-play: npm run test:examples-play && browserify examples/play/src/index.js -o examples/play/app.js
